  • Constructor Details

    • ChessPiece

      public ChessPiece​(boolean white, String name)
      creates a chess piece to put on the board
      Parameters:
      white - whether or not it's a white or black piece
      name - output string that will be shown in the ascii art

    • isOppositeColor

      public boolean isOppositeColor​(ChessPiece[][] board, int row, int col)
      determines if the piece in the specified spot is the same color as this piece
      Parameters:
      board - the 2D array of Chess pieces
      row - the row of the piece
      col - the column of the piece
      Returns:
      whether or not the piece in the spot is the same color as this piece
